events.message: I ordered a jacket last week and want to return it because it doesn't fit me well. Please let me know how I can get a refund.
The customer's request relates to a refund due to size issues with the jacket order.
Support agent Emma has been assigned to handle the refund request for the returned jacket.
Hello! I'm Emma from customer support, and I'll be assisting you with the refund process for your jacket.
Could you please provide the order number and confirm if the jacket is unused and still has the original tags?
The order number is 1234567890. The jacket is unused and tags are intact, as I just tried it on once and realized it doesn't fit.
Thank you for the info. You can send the jacket back using the prepaid return label. Once we receive it, we will process your refund within 3-5 business days.
Thanks for the quick help! I appreciate the prepaid label option. I will send it back tomorrow.
We have received the returned jacket and successfully processed your refund. The amount should appear on your original payment method shortly.
Just checking in to confirm you received the refund and if there's anything else we can help you with regarding your recent return.
We are closing this case now as your refund has been completed. Thank you for contacting customer support.
